title: Kendall Jenner slips into a sexy jumpsuit for glamorous date night with Fai Khadra in Santa Monica
text:
She took friend Fai Khadra as her date to Hailey Baldwin and Justin Bieber's wedding at the end of last month.

And Kendall Jenner was spotted out on a romantic evening with the model on Saturday night.

The pair spent the night at the Bungalow in Santa Monica and opted to keep their distance while leaving the popular A-list eatery.

Date night: Kendall Jenner showcased her stunning off-duty model look when she stepped out for dinner with her friend Fai Khadra in Santa Monica on Saturday night

Kendall rocked an elegant pin-stripe jumpsuit that featured very low cut-outs on the side.

She added to her already tall 5ft10 stature with a pair of pumps that had a unique heel to them.

The Vogue model accessorised with a trendy designer clutch and large diamond stud earrings.

Distance: The pair spent the night at the Bungalow in Santa Monica and opted to keep their distance while leaving the popular A-list eatery

Sexy: Kendall rocked an elegant pin-stripe jumpsuit that featured very low cut-outs on the side

Kendall's brunette hair was styled out straight and slick and she kept her makeup natural yet glamorous.

Her complexion featured contoured cheekbones, a smokey cat-eye and a plump nude lip.

Fai rocked a suit and appeared well shaven for their evening date night.

Stunner: Her complexion featured contoured cheekbones, a smokey cat-eye and a plump nude lip

Just her date: Kendall brought the model as her date to Hailey and Justin's wedding on September 30, but insisted they were nothing more than friends

Twinning! Fai and Kendall have been close for some time (pictured in matching shirts at Wimbledon in London 2019)

Kendall brought the model as her date to Hailey and Justin's wedding on September 30, but insisted they were nothing more than friends.

'we don't date he's just my date,' she captioned in the now deleted Instagram post.

The beauty and Fai have been friends for a long time, even wearing matching Halloween costumes in 2018.

And besides Kendall, he's made his way around the Kar-Jen family, reportedly dating her elder sister, Kourtney Kardashian, 40, for some time following her initial split from Younes Bendjima.

Rebound: Fai reportedly dated Kendall's her elder sister, Kourtney Kardashian, 40, for some time in late 2018 following her initial split from Younes Bendjima (pictured in September 2019)

Former love: He was also speculated to have been dating the family's ex BFF, Jordyn Woods, for a year (pictured in NYC in 2017)

He was also speculated to have been dating the family's ex BFF, Jordyn Woods, for a year.

Kendall was last linked to NBA player, Ben Simmons. The pair called it off in May 2019 after months of dating on-and-off.

The beauty also spent much of Saturday with her mom, Kris Jenner, where she showcased her 'P***y Power' bag she brought to an event.
description: Kendall Jenner showcased her stunning off-duty model look when she stepped out for dinner with her friend Fai Khadra in Santa Monica on Saturday night.
